ORCS Documentation¶

Welcome to ORCS documentation !

ORCS (Outils de Réduction de Cubes Spectraux) is a data
extraction software for cubes reduced with ORBS. It is aimed to produce parameter maps for all the lines present in the spectrum cube.

Warning

This is still a development version of ORCS. You might see bugs or strange behaviours !
